summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4497 for the improvement of 49th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52826, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
